articles.title: James Webb Telescope looks for first stars formed 13.5 billion years ago - CGTN
articles.description: In a unique collaboration between NASA, the European Space Agency and the Canadian Space Agency the James Webb Telescope has been built to shine a light on the birth of the universe
articles.content:
The telescope is named after James E. Webb, who was the administrator of NASA from 1961 to 1968./NASA/AFP
